entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is Harry's son who is about to start at Hogwarts. He has inherited Lily's eyes and is named after two headmasters of Hogwarts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is Albus's father and a former student of Hogwarts. He is giving advice to his son before he leaves for school.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Harry's wife and Albus's mother. She is waving goodbye to Rose on the train.

entities.name: peevs
entities.description: Peeves is a mischievous ghost who lives in Hogwarts. Harry warns Albus not to mess with him.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is likely James Potter, Harry's father and a former student of Hogwarts. Harry warns Albus not to let him wind him up.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid has invited Albus to tea next Friday. He is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Albus should avoid Peeves, a mischievous ghost at Hogwarts.
Hagrid has invited Albus to tea next Friday.
